_metadata._comment: dashboard-global-config.json â€” All dashboard screen behaviour, list sizes, snooze, reschedule, task completion, and task history.
_metadata._comment_2: Namespaces: dashboard.*, snooze.*, reschedule.*, task.completion.*, task.history.*

dashboard._comment: Dashboard screen â€” three lists: today, tomorrow, upcoming.

today_list._comment: Today's task list â€” acts as an action list. Tasks shown in chronological order.
today_list._comment_count: Max tasks shown before Show More link. Configurable.
today_list._comment_load_more: Additional tasks loaded per Show More tap.
today_list._comment_sort: Tasks shown in time order. Completed tasks move to bottom regardless of time.
today_list._comment_bubble: If user gave task a custom title, shown as a smaller label beneath the task name.
today_list._comment_missed: Shown before checkbox when task time has passed and task is not completed.
today_list._comment_visibility: Missed tasks remain visible until user sleep time, or midnight if sleep time not configured.
today_list._comment_fallback: Used when sleep time is not configured in user preferences.
today_list._comment_times: Tasks with multiple daily times are shown as separate rows, each with their own checkbox.
today_list._comment_completed: Completed tasks strike through and animate to the bottom of today's list.
today_list._comment_points: Resolved from points-global-config.json. Duplicated here as display reference only.

tomorrow_list._comment: Tomorrow's task list â€” consolidated view, no checkboxes, reschedule and skip only.
tomorrow_list._comment_consolidated: Multiple daily times for the same task shown as a single entry.
tomorrow_list._comment_past: Users cannot reschedule a task to a past date.

upcoming_list._comment: Upcoming task list â€” monthly, quarterly, yearly tasks only. Next 3 months.
upcoming_list._comment_lookahead: How far ahead to scan for upcoming tasks.
upcoming_list._comment_included: Weekly and daily tasks intentionally excluded. Confirmed requirement.
upcoming_list._comment_hide: If no upcoming tasks in the lookahead window, entire section is hidden.

dashboard._comment_redirect: If user has zero tasks configured, redirect to category screen instead of empty dashboard.

fab._comment: Floating Action Button â€” bottom right corner of dashboard.
fab._comment_navigate: FAB leads to category screen for minimum-taps task creation.

snooze._comment: Snooze options for today's incomplete tasks. Values in minutes.
snooze._comment_labels: i18n keys for snooze chip labels. Must match options_minutes array in order.
snooze._comment_alarm: If an OS alarm was set for this task, cancel and reschedule it after snooze.
snooze._comment_history: Record snooze events in task history for future analytics.
snooze._comment_limit: -1 = unlimited snoozes. Set a positive integer to cap snooze count per task per day.

reschedule._comment: Reschedule behaviour for tomorrow and upcoming tasks.
reschedule._comment_history: When rescheduled, the original scheduled time is preserved in task history.

task_completion._comment: Rules governing how task completion is recorded, displayed, and reversed.
task_completion._comment_points: 1 point per completed task. Source of truth is points-global-config.json.
task_completion._comment_untick: Users can undo a completion for tasks completed within this many days.
task_completion._comment_warning: Warning shown when unticking: explains user will lose 1 point.
task_completion._comment_skip: Value stored in Isar task_logs collection when user taps Skip.

task_history._comment: Task history screen â€” grouped by date, filterable, editable within window.
task_history._comment_summary: 1-2 line motivational summary at top of history screen. Template in notification-config.json.
task_history._comment_style: Horizontal scrollable chip bar â€” same style as WhatsApp chat filters.
task_history._comment_date_format: e.g. 'Monday 23 February'. Follows active language date conventions.
task_history._comment_editable: Tasks within this many days can be ticked/unticked.
task_history._comment_retention: Task history retained in Isar for this many months before archiving.
